long_description: With a well-ventilated suspension, a hydration sleeve and lightweight construction, the easygoing Mountain Hardwear Fluid 24 Pack is perfect for hiking, travel or any all-day journeys. Soft, ventilated shoulder straps; stowable webbing hipbelt. Close-fitting suspension with on-the-fly compression and venting channels to prevent overheating. Easy-access hydration sleeve offers choice of routing tube over the shoulder or from the lower part of the pack, left or right (reservoir sold separately). Top fleece-lined zippered pocket for safe storage of sunglasses, smart phone or other valuables; zippered front pocket with key clip. The Mountain Hardwear Fluid 24 Pack features stowable ice-axe loops and high-visibility reflective hits.
short_description: With a well-ventilated suspension, a hydration sleeve and lightweight construction, the easygoing Mountain Hardwear Fluid 24 Pack is perfect for hiking, travel or any all-day journeys.
